name: The Collective
description: A technologically advanced extraterrestrial civilization that has achieved near-perfection through the merger of biological evolution and technological augmentation. The Collective operates as a unified consciousness, sharing psionic energy across a vast neural network that spans entire star systems.
shortDescription: Advanced aliens with energy weapons, psionics, and teleportation
lore: Millennia ago, the beings that would become The Collective faced extinction on their dying homeworld. Through desperate innovation, they developed psionic amplification technology that allowed them to link their minds into a shared consciousness. This Great Convergence saved their species and propelled them into an era of unprecedented advancement. Now they travel the stars, seeking to bring enlightenment to lesser beings - whether they wish it or not.

theme.aesthetics: Sleek crystalline structures with flowing energy conduits, holographic displays, and bioluminescent accents

strengths.name: Energy Shields
strengths.description: All units possess regenerating energy shields that absorb damage

strengths.name: Psionic Mastery
strengths.description: Powerful psychic abilities for combat and utility

strengths.name: Warp Technology
strengths.description: Units can teleport to powered areas instantly

strengths.name: Advanced Weaponry
strengths.description: Energy-based weapons with high damage output

weaknesses.name: Resource Intensive
weaknesses.description: Units and structures cost more resources than other races

weaknesses.name: Power Dependency
weaknesses.description: Buildings require pylon power fields to function

weaknesses.name: Slow Production
weaknesses.description: Advanced units take longer to produce

weaknesses.name: Fragile Without Shields
weaknesses.description: Most units have low base health, relying on shields

power_grid.name: Psionic Power Grid
power_grid.description: Buildings must be constructed within pylon power fields. Each pylon provides power to structures in its radius. Unpowered buildings cease to function.

shields.name: Plasma Shields
shields.description: All Collective units possess regenerating energy shields. Shields absorb all damage until depleted, then begin regenerating after a delay.

warp.name: Warp Matrix
warp.description: Units trained at Warp Gates can instantly teleport to any powered pylon. This allows rapid reinforcement of distant locations.

psionic_link.name: Psionic Network
psionic_link.description: Psionic units share a mental link, providing vision and enabling coordinated abilities. Casters can combine their power for devastating effects.

tertiary.name: Psionic Energy
tertiary.description: Mental energy generated by psionic units

tier_1.name: Basic Forces
tier_1.description: Core units available from the start

tier_4.name: Legendary Forces
tier_4.description: Ultimate units representing the pinnacle of Collective power
